review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Did you come from your authentic self yesterday? How did it feel? That put you on
            The Path.

step_of_the_day.title:
Step of the Day:
            Connect authentically with a friend today. Allow yourself to be vulnerable in your contact with a friend
            today (Pillar #2)
step_of_the_day.content:
“Don’t walk in front of me… I may not followDon’t walk behind me… I may not leadWalk beside me… just be my friend\"Albert CamusI talk a lot about how easy it is to go about your day on “automatic\". This is when you act from a place of
            habit and without intention. It’s only when you pay attention and are present to the moment that life is
            lived in technicolor.Today, bring this concept of being in the moment, of being aware and present, and living with intention, to
            one of your relationships.

action_step:
Connect from a place of caring and vulnerability with one of your friends today. Use this connection as an
            opportunity to show more of yourself while asking questions that support a fuller expression from your
            friend. Be in the moment and appreciate the connection.
journal_entry: Write about your typical style of relating to your friends. Are you able to show your true self?
